title: Monumenta Germaniae Historica: Scriptores Rerum Germanicarum

see-also.note: Monumenta Germaniae Historica: Scriptores Rerum Germanicarum, Nova Series

additional-notes: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for it under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked volume titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
